extendedInfo.description: Official Selection, 2013 PAX East Indie Showcase"You don't want to pass this one up." - Touch Arcade (4.5/5) "Little Chomp is an expertly tuned touchscreen climber that is not to be missed."  - IGN (8/10)"An addictive gaming experience." - App Safari (4/5)"What is particularly likable about [Little Chomp] is the ever-changing challenges that each level brings."  - Game Trender**************The Chompwood Kingdom is loaded with fruit, but itâs going to take a daring caterpillar named LITTLE CHOMP to get it!One part classic platformer, one part physics puzzler, Little Chomp challenges you to brave three unique worlds in a quest to chomp the tastiest fruit and collect the rarest butterflies. Take aim, fling from leaf to leaf, spring off mushrooms, collect all the loot and solve every challenge, all while dodging dangerous enemies in this fast-paced touchscreen climber!Little Chomp features 54 levels, 162 skill challenges, and 108 unique butterflies for hours of climbing, collecting, and chomping!Little caterpillar. Big challenge.**************FEATURES:â Exciting, fast-paced gameplay!â Beautiful HD graphicsâ Three magical worlds to explore! Over 50 fun and challenging levels.â Six upgradable Powerups! Spend the coins you collect to help Little Chomp face-off against his enemies.â Over 100 unique butterflies to create by feeding the hungry caterpillars of Chompwood Kingdom!â Three skill challenges on every level to unlock extra fruit and bragging rights!**************Hi there! We're ClutchPlay Games, and we hope you have as much fun playing Little Chomp as we had making it! We'd love to hear your feedback, so please drop us a line at feedback@clutchplaygames.com. For news, support and updated info, please visit us at: www.facebook.com/LittleChompGame twitter.com/LittleChompGame www.clutchplaygames.com/Support

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: I luv this game...definitely Challenging, Entertaining and Addicting. I don\'t want to put it down lol :) ..Keep up the great work!! It is way over 5 stars!  :)
reviews.author: Crystal Lynette

reviews.title: My new addiction!!
reviews.comment: Very cute and addictive game. Love it.  :-)   love that there are so many levels!
reviews.author: Lisa Myers

reviews.title: Fun, easy to play, difficult to master
reviews.comment: This game is very fun and addicting, as well as fast paced and cute. I tried the Lite version and fell in love with this game. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for some mobile fun. :)
reviews.author: Heather Morris

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: Had a hard time letting go of the game at PAX.  Please make more caterpillar plushies...
reviews.author: Jennifer Barbier

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Enjoyable to pick up and okay or to freak out too
reviews.author: Micah Brennan

reviews.title: Worth paying for
reviews.comment: Entertaing in short bursts or longer!
reviews.author: karla marley

reviews.title: Yes
reviews.comment: Buy it, it\'s a straight thuggin game
reviews.author: Christopher Kratoska

reviews.title: Super fun little game
reviews.comment: Well worth the price. Bought at PAX, showed to two people at dinner, they bought it immediately as well.recommend.
reviews.author: Ted Bruyere

reviews.title: Fun and Addicting
reviews.comment: Very fun and entertaining game. Easy to pick up and play for a few minutes, as well as play for an hour unlocking a bunch of butterflies! Love the artwork and all the different styles of insects and fruit. I love that you get enough coins to unlock and use power-ups without having to buy them (but still can buy if you really want/need to). Overall, a simple and well-made concept with great art and music. Runs well, plays well, and is definitely addictive to play! Was glad to see it become available to more than just iOS devices :)
reviews.author: Wanda Worsley

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Charming, relaxing game.  I like it better than Angry Birds.  Thanks for the demo at PAX East.  It does have the problem of usually muffling the sound while I\'m playing, and then getting louder again when I complete the level.  It would be better if the sound level was constant.
reviews.author: Brett Bernakevitch

reviews.title: Great addictive play
reviews.comment: This is a great game to pass the time on the bus/train/plane.
reviews.author: Marco D\'Alelio

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Works great on motorola droid 4. Fun and a bit addicting
reviews.author: Anna s
